comments:
Description: In property editor view of chart element, let its height/width 
value blank and press "enter" key, exception is thrown out.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set property for this chart.
3. In "General" page, let its height blank then press "Enter" key.

Expected result: error message pops up.
Actual result: Exception is thrown out.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: "fromUnits"must be one of the absolute 
units(CM, IN, MM, PT).
